= OOP =
== relations between classes ==
Extenstion, Compostion, Aggregation

=== Aggregation vs Composition ===
- Aggregation
A "use" B, B exist independently (conceptually) from A

weak association

- Compsition
A "own" B, B has no meaning or purpose in the system without A

strong association
